text: int main ( ) { int k , i , j , inc , a [ 2600 ] , n , tot , max [ 1000 ] , sum , test ; scanf ( "%d" , & test ) ; for ( k = 0 ; k < test ; k ++ ) { max [ k ] = INT_MIN ; printf ( "Enter the value of n:" ) ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; tot = n * ( n + 1 ) / 2 ; for ( i = 0 ; i < tot ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] ) ; } if ( tot > 1 ) { for ( i = 0 , inc = 1 ; ; ) { sum = 0 ; j = i + inc ; sum = a [ i ] + a [ j ] + a [ j + 1 ] ; if ( max [ k ] < sum ) max [ k ] = sum ; i = i + inc ; inc ++ ; if ( j + inc >= tot ) break ; } } else max [ k ] = a [ 0 ] ; } for ( k = 0 ; k < test ; k ++ ) printf ( "\n%d" , max [ k ] ) ; }
